mapper.select: SELECT A.CATEGORY_NO AS MAIN_CATE_NO, A.CATEGORY_NAME AS MAIN_CATE_NAME, B.CATEGORY_NO AS SUB_CATE_NO, B.CATEGORY_NAME AS SUB_CATE_NAME FROM CATEGORY A JOIN CATEGORY B ON A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_PRENO

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(P PK_PRODUCTNO) */ rownum rn, P.* FROM PRODUCT P WHERE PET_TYPE = #{type} AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' ) a WHERE a.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 8 AND a.rn <= (#{page}) * 8

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(P PK_PRODUCTNO) */ rownum rn, P.* FROM PRODUCT P WHERE P.CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} AND PET_TYPE = #{type} ) a WHERE a.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 8 AND a.rn <= (#{page}) * 8
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM PRODUCT WHERE PET_TYPE = #{type} AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'

SELECT A.CART_NO AS CART_NO, C.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, C.PRODUCT_PRICE AS PRODUCT_PRICE, A.SELECT_CNT AS SEL_CNT, A.PRODUCT_NO AS PRODUCT_NO FROM MY_CART A JOIN USER_TBL B ON A.MEMBER_NO = B.USER_NO JOIN PRODUCT C ON A.PRODUCT_NO = C.PRODUCT_NO WHERE B.USER_NO = #{userNo}

#{arr}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE PET_TYPE = #{petType} ORDER BY PRODUCT_REGIST_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM PRODUCT A JOIN REVIEW B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE A.PET_TYPE = #{petType} GROUP BY A.PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY CNT DESC ) A JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO FROM PRODUCT A JOIN REVIEW B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE A.PET_TYPE = #{petType} GROUP BY A.PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY AVG(B.STAR_CNT) ) A JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
mapper.update: update product set product_stock = product_stock-#{cnt} where product_no = #{productNo}
